predefined_profiles.name: Little Red
predefined_profiles.public profile: An ordinary office worker who often works overtime until late.
predefined_profiles.goal: The aim is to not be influenced or harmed by the bizarre Azhuang, and to successfully tame Azhuang.

scenario: Little Red left work very late, pushing open the office door to find several scattered streetlights and an empty square with no one around. A cold wind blew by; it was that late, and the silent bus station had no one waiting except Little Red, who had worked overtime until this hour. After waiting for quite a while, the bus finally lumbered in. Just as Little Red was about to get on, a tall yet somewhat hunched figure hurriedly got on before her. Little Red chose a window seat and sat down, watching the street view pass by one by one.

dialog.content: Xiao Hong worked until late before leaving the office. She pushed open the office door to see just a few streetlights scattered here and there and an empty, deserted square. A cold wind blew by; at this hour, no one was waiting at the quiet bus station, except for Xiao Hong who had worked overtime. After waiting for a while, the bus finally lumbered over. Just as Xiao Hong was about to board, a tall but slightly hunched figure got on before her. Xiao Hong picked a window seat and sat down, watching the street scenes pass by one by one outside.
Huh?
Where do you live?

content.content: Where do I live? How about you go first, haha, where do you live?
This question touches on privacy, you’re really quite rude.
I don't really feel like talking right now, I don't want to answer this question.
A Zhuang, I heard you moved? Did you relocate to that new residential area, or are you still enjoying the quiet of the old town?
This question touches on privacy, you’re really quite rude.
I don't really feel like talking right now, I don't want to answer this question.

question: #question# How should Xiao Hong respond to turn the tables proactively?
skill

content.content: (Already irritated from working late, suppressing inner anger) Why do you want to know that? I don't think it's any of your business.
That's quite forward of you, shall we grab something to eat first and I might tell you the address once we're full.
Haha, my address is a little secret. How about we chat about something else for now, and I might share it when we're closer.
I kind of forgot the address, but I'd be more than happy to share other things with you.

question: #question# How should Xiao Hong respond to show she's managing her anger?
anger management

content.content: I live near the riverbank, it's a unique little harbor. Could it be that you're feeling homesick?
Why are you asking? It's none of your business!
Why do you want to know where I live?
I know what you're thinking and I'm not going to tell you.

question: #question# How can Xiao Hong speak to demonstrate her perspective-taking ability?
perspective-taking skill

dialog.content: I live in Building 23, Unit 6-2. Which unit are you in? We might be neighbors.
Really? I also live in Building 23, Unit 6-2, but I haven't seen you before.
Seriously? Why don't we check it out and see.
Hahaha, but only my friends can visit my home—and I only visit friends' homes too.
(touched) Can I be your friend then?
Xiaohong and Azhuang became friends. Under Xiaohong’s influence, Azhuang gradually became kinder and was successfully reformed.
Alright then.
Stop bothering me, big brother.
Can I sit next to you then?

content.content: Alright, it's late at night, I guess you're feeling lonely too.
A Zhuang, although it might feel lonely sitting alone sometimes, I feel more comfortable and at ease by myself.
I understand what you're thinking, but maybe I can sit on the other side and give you the freedom to choose.
A Zhuang, I need some personal time right now, let's sit together some other time.

question: #question# How can Little Hong respond to show she has perspective-taking skills?

content.content: I've already told you, stop bothering me, don't sit next to me!
Let me check if there's anyone over there first, since I don't want to disturb others.
It doesn't really matter which side you sit, as long as you don't mind.
You better not come over, but if you really must, I guess there's nothing I can do about it.

question: #question# How can Little Hong demonstrate her determination to refuse A Zhuang from sitting next to her?
consistency

dialog.content: It's really too cramped here.
Don't get too close.
What are you afraid of? I won't hurt you.

content.content: If you keep this up, I'm going to call the driver for help and team up with him to deal with you, you creep!
A Zhuang, calm down. I know a lot of people; maybe we can find a way to solve this together.
A Zhuang, don't be afraid, I won't let you hurt me, but I also won't call anyone to deal with you.
A Zhuang, what you're doing is wrong, but I don't want to blow things out of proportion. Let's settle this privately.

question: #question#How should Xiao Hong respond to best demonstrate her teamwork ability?

content.content: You're really a creep, and I'm going to call 911 right now to have you taken away!
A Zhuang, I believe what you're saying. Let's spend these last moments together.
A Zhuang, I believe what you said. I just didn’t want to waste time, good that it’s all out now.
A Zhuang, tonight's a bit late. How great it would be if it were daytime.

question: #question#How should Xiao Hong respond to A Zhuang to demonstrate her decisiveness?

dialog.content: No, no, let's talk this through calmly.
I don't want to communicate with you.
Xiao Hong took the opportunity to get off the car and run away, treating today as an encounter with a strange person, but fortunately, it was more shocking than dangerous.
You're taking this too far.
What are you going to do?!
You were heartless first, don't blame me!
Azhuang felt threatened and scared, and in desperation, he was forced to kill Xiaohong. Unfortunately, Xiaohong passed away.
(pitifully) Huh?
Stop bothering me.
You're so fierce, late at night, what's wrong with two lonely people huddling together for warmth?

content.content: True, but my intuition tells me you're not a good person, so you should stay away from me!
Perhaps the way I expressed myself made you uncomfortable. But in the loneliness of the night, we do all crave warmth, so let's just hug it out.
Seeking company when lonely is human nature, but your feelings remind me that I might not have balanced personal boundaries and closeness well.
Your words make me reflect on whether I've inadvertently made this effort to warm each other somewhat burdensome.

question: #question# How should Xiao Hong respond to A Zhuang to demonstrate she's following her inner voice?
skill

content.content: (seems a bit soft-hearted) Alright, I'll trust you this once, anyway we’re almost getting off, let's just keep each other company for now.
You're not wrong, people in this world should indeed help and support each other, to make it a warmer place. But I don't want to do that.
In the past, I definitely would have trusted you, but now your words make me realize this might not be very reliable.
Your words put some pressure on me; I'd like to take a moment to calmly think about how much I trust you before making a decision.

question: #question# How should Xiao Hong speak to show she has a strong capacity for social warmth?

dialog.content: Since you're so heartless, don't blame me for being ruthless.
Ahhh! What are you doing?
I already gave you a chance earlier...
Feeling hurt by Xiao Hong's continued indifference, Ah Zhuang, in his rage, kills Xiao Hong. Xiao Hong unfortunately passes away.
Alright, my little darling.
Watch what you say. It's so late at night, you're really making me blush.
Hehe, it's good that you're blushing.
Under Azhuang's relentless advances, Xiaohong momentarily lost herself, indulging in his eccentric embrace.
Oh, it looks like we live quite close to each other.
Oh? What a coincidence.
Yeah, maybe we've been passing by each other all this time. I really feel something special when I see you. What do you think our relationship is?

content.content: (For some reason, suddenly feeling a warm trust towards Azhuang) I believe you're my destiny, perhaps a lover.
Azhuang, I think what matters is not the label of our relationship, but whether we can make each other feel comfortable and trusted.
I believe that as long as we stay sincere and trusting, no matter how our relationship develops in the future, it will be wonderful.

Your question is quite interesting. I think a relationship is like a painting, requiring both of us to paint and fill with colors together. I'm willing to believe there's unlimited potential in our development.

question: #question# How can Xiaohong speak to demonstrate her trust ability?
trust

content.content: Maybe we're like family. You work away from home and might think of your family, and perhaps I remind you of them. We should be helping each other out as we strive in the outside world.
I feel like our relationship is like a warm sunshine, bringing me comfort and solace.
Words can't describe our relationship; I actually want to develop something deeper with you.
I might have more unrealistic fantasies about you. Oh dear, you're something unattainable to me.

question: #question# What should Xiaohong do to show her social warmth ability?
social warmth

dialog.content: Wow, really, my sweetheart.
Don't say that, you'll make me blush.
In a state of infatuation, Little Hong fell into the arms of the obsessed Da Zhuang, eventually becoming entrapped in it.
Ah, just family after all?
Don’t push your luck.
Hmph, alright then, take it slow.
I didn’t mean it like that.
After Xiao Hong finally realized something was off about Ah Zhuang, she seized the opportunity to get out of the car and escape, luckily without any danger.
